cmput301f13t10.presenter

Interface Media

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImageMedia, MockMedia, SoundMedia, TextMedia

    public interface Media
extends java.io.Serializable
    This class is implemented for medias that can be represented by an android view
    Author:
    Brendan Cowan

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getId()
      Get the id of the media
      View toView(Context c)
      Convert the media to a view that android can represent

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        Get the id of the media

        The id of the media

      • toView

        View toView(Context c)
        Convert the media to a view that android can represent
        Parameters:
        c - The context of the view that will be returned
        Returns:
        The media in the form of a View
